statements: SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, product_id FROM user_interactions WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 2 AND product_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Click' ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(product_id) AS num_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, product_id, interaction_type, interaction_time FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE product_id = 5 ORDER BY interaction_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS unique_products FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING unique_products > 2;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM user_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, DATE(interaction_time) AS date, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM user_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type, date ORDER BY date ASC, interaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM recommendation_interactions LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, product_id, timestamp FROM recommendation_interactions WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT product_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM recommendation_interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM recommendation_interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, frequency FROM user_behaviors WHERE frequency > 10 ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM recommendation_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, interaction_type FROM recommendation_interactions WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM recommendation_interactions WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, frequency FROM user_behaviors WHERE behavior_type LIKE '%click%' AND frequency > 10;
SELECT user_id, SUM(frequency) AS total_frequency FROM user_behaviors GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_frequency > 50;
SELECT * FROM recommendation_interaction WHERE interaction_type='like';
SELECT user_id, product_id, interaction_type FROM recommendation_interaction WHERE interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS interactions_count FROM recommendation_interaction GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY interactions_count DESC;
SELECT user_name, email, age FROM user_profile WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT * FROM product_recommendation WHERE recommendation_timestamp < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY recommendation_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_name, age, location FROM user_profile;
SELECT * FROM product_recommendation WHERE recommendation_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_name, email, location FROM user_profile WHERE age >= 25 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM recommendation_interaction WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_name, email, age, location FROM user_profile WHERE location = 'New York' AND age <= 30 ORDER BY age
SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM product_recommendations WHERE recommendation_type = 'high' ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS count_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING count_interactions > 5;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, behavior_value FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type IN ('like', 'comment') ORDER BY behavior_value ASC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, recommendation_type, recommendation_score FROM product_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8 ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, behavior_value FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' AND behavior_value IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, recommended_product_id, recommendation_date FROM user_recommendations WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY recommendation_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM recommendations;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_behavior ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name, category FROM products;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_interactions FROM user_behavior GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 3;
SELECT user_id, product_id, interaction_type FROM recommendations_logs WHERE user_id = 100 AND interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_behavior WHERE interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, age, gender FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_interactions FROM recommendations_logs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
